    vs_3_0
    def c4, 0, 0, 0, 0
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_color1 v1
    dcl_texcoord1 v2
    dcl_texcoord2 v3
    dcl_texcoord3 v4
    dcl_texcoord4 v5
    dcl_texcoord2 o0
    dcl_texcoord o1
    dcl_texcoord4 o2
    dcl_position o3

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s3

    mov o0, v1
    mov o1, c4.x
    mov r0.x, v3.y
    mov r0.y, v4.y
    mov r0.z, v5.y
    add r1.xyw, c7.xyzz, v2.xyzz
    mov r0.w, r1.y
    dp4 r0.x, r0, v0
    mul r0, r0.x, c1
    mov r2.w, r1.x
    mov r2.x, v3.x
    mov r2.y, v4.x
    mov r2.z, v5.x
    dp4 r2.x, r2, v0
    mad r0, c0, r2.x, r0
    mov r1.x, v3.z
    mov r1.y, v4.z
    mov r1.z, v5.z
    dp4 r1.x, r1, v0
    mad r0, c2, r1.x, r0
    mad r0, c3, v0.w, r0
    mul r1.x, r0.w, c6.z
    mad r0.xy, r1.x, c6, r0

mov o3, r0 // Relocated from line 56 with shadertool.py

// Automatic vertex shader halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-vertex-halo --only-autofixed --stereo-sampler-vs=s3 226D91A1.txt
texldl r31, c220.z, s3
add r31.w, r0.w, -r31.y
mad r0.x, r31.w, r31.x, r0.x

    mov o2, r0

//     mov o3, r0 // Relocated to line 55 with shadertool.py
